body_text: Steins;Gate, Chaos;Head and Robotics;Notes naming convention with semicolon? The anime Steins;Gate, Chaos;Head and Robotics;Notes all share the use of the semi-colon as part of their names. What is the reason for using the semi-colon within the titles of these anime?

Why are these animes called so? (something;something) There are manga/anime called "something;something", what for? does it server any purpose for identifying it as a series? example: steins;gate, robotic;notes.
